According to a long-standing statute unique to Uni Prefecture, in the event of the death, disappearance, or felony-prosecution of the chosen candidate on, while, during, or concurrent with the Re-Election-Night ceremony, all powers and authorities vested in his or her designated office
La Cour, en vertu des pouvoirs qui lui sont conférés, rejette la demande d'un nouveau procès
